title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-2.7 - Administrative Costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-2.7 - Administrative Costs

State Regulations

Any activities carried out by the district superintendent
or the BOCES, pursuant to this Part, shall qualify as part of the BOCES
administrative costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
124-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
